heading:
Reading : Relationship

The Relationship reading is one in which the relationship between the questioner and one other person or party is examined.

cards.readingSpotExplanation: Card 1 points towards what keeps the questioner busy.
Card 2 points towards what the partner is kept busy by.
Card 3 tells what the questioner has to learn.
Card 4 tells what the partner should learn.
Card 5 explains how the questioner could improve the relationship.
Card 7 shows the future prospects for the relationship.
